President told Fauci that his cautious stance on reopening schools is ‘not an acceptable answer’. Fauci endorsed a extremely prudent approach to reopening schools in the fall, CNN reported. Fauci in his testimony before the Senate committee on Tuesday responded to the question, how to persuade parents or students to return to school by saying, “I would tell her that in this case, that the idea of having treatments available, or a vaccination, to facilitate the reentry of students into the fall term would be something that would be a bit of a bridge too far”. Trump in response to Fauci’s statement said, ""We're opening our country. People want it open. The schools are going to be open."" Our President is reeling people’s whose boss. Thank you sir.
